name: Mobilike
tag_list: mobile, mobile-ad, mobile-network, rich-media, mobile-banner, video-ad
overview:
mobilike has the largest premium mobile advertising network in Turkey with over 600 million page impressions on mobile phones and tablets. mobilike offers a wide variety of progressive mobile ad products and 85% reach of all mobile internet users in Turkey.

mobilike is the innovation leader of mobile advertising in Turkey, as it’s the first company to provide rich media and video ads on smartphones and tablets. Being a one-stop-shop for mobile advertising solutions, mobilike enabled over a hundred top brands first mobile advertising campaign by providing them with creative and strategic support.

mobilike’s exclusive network of publishers consists of big media groups like Doğuş Media Group (ntvmsnbc, Star TV, NTVSpor.net, CNBC-e etc.) and Doğan Yayın Holding (Kanal D, CNNTürk), as well as independent publishers and developers, reaching a stand-alone asset amount of 300+.

mobilike is the group company of Europe’s leader mobile advertising player madvertise and representative of Turkey and MENA region. madvertise was founded in 2008 by Carsten Frien, Pan Katsukis, Thomas Hille, Martin Karlsch and Team Europe and has offices in Berlin, Hamburg, London, Barcelona, Madrid and Milan. mobilike was founded in 2009 by Şekip Can Gökalp & Volkan Biçer and is based in Istanbul. Company is a member of Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB) and Mobile Marketing Association (MMA).

Further information is available at www.mobilike.com Become a fan on Facebook or follow on Twitter

offices.address1: Emniyetevler Mh. Yamaç Sk. No.8 K.4  4 Levent

milestones.source_description: Germany’s madvertise makes a move into the Middle East with Mobilike acquisition
